original_text: He had also built high places on the hills of Judah and had caused the people of Jerusalem to prostitute themselves and had led Judah astray.
korean_text: 여호람이 또 유다 여러 산에 산당을 세워 예루살렘 주민으로 음행하게 하고 또 유다를 미혹하게 하였으므로

sentences.original_text: He had also built high places on the hills of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 유다의 언덕에 산당들을 건설하기도 하였고

sentences.original_text: and had caused the people of Jerusalem to prostitute themselves
